title: How Peter Asher, a Jack-of-all-Trades in Music, Mastered Them All
description: The British musician, manager, producer, executive and author known for his work with Linda Ronstadt and James Taylor, is the subject of a new book exploring his unique run in the industry.
dc:creator: Bob Mehr
category: Peter Asher: A Life in Music (Book)
